highlights: Built CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for automated Build, Test and Deployment processes ensuring smooth updates for the Telex app.
Implemented Monitoring and Observability solutions using Grafana, Loki, Promtail and Prometheus, enabling real-time tracking of the Telex's server and application metrics.
Configured a Kubernetes Cluster to serve as a Self-Hosted GitHub Actions Runner improving CI/CD efficiency for Telex's cross-platform development.
Containerized and Deployed a full-stack web application using Docker and configured proxy manager for efficient routing.
Trained entry level staff of banks (FirstBank, Stanbic IBTC Bank) on the use of cloud services on Azure
Prepared demos and learning materials on Azure Administration, Azure AI, and Azure Data Services.
Created hands-on labs and practical exercises to reinforce learning and ensure participants gained real-world experience with Azure tools and services.
Collaborated with bank IT departments to customize training content, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and compliance with industry standards

Implemented and optimized the admin dashboard of the crypto payment management system for the Patricia applications using React.js, Next.js, and TailwindCSS, resulting in an 80% improvement in payment management.
Wrote and documented CRUD APIs related to customer payments on the Vaunt Laravel application.
Implemented logging and monitoring using Sentry which helped identify bugs in the application, improving uptime by over 25%.
Increased the security of the payment admin dashboard by 70% by implementing token-based Two-Factor Authentication, ensuring secure access to the payment system.
Refactored the data fetching layer of the application to use React Query, reducing duplicated code and improving performance.
Successfully enhanced the frontend resilience of the crypto payment management system by writing component and integration tests using Jest and Playwright, reducing app crashes in production by 90%.

Reduced runtime bugs in the production environment of the payment management system by porting the JavaScript-based React application to TypeScript, ensuring smoother performance, type-safety, and efficient debugging.

projects.name: YouTube Splitter App
projects.description: A YouTube splitter app that splits a YouTube video into a specified number of parts.

projects.name: Create Env Action
projects.description: A GitHub Action that creates .env files in GitHub Actions workflow, streamlining environment configuration.

projects.name: Telex Aggregator
projects.description: A logger app that monitors log files and sends new entries to an ingestor via webhook.

awards.summary: Demonstrated proficiency in cloud computing on Azure and solutions built on the cloud, resulting in achieving the Microsoft AZ-900 certification.
awards.title: Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900)
Azure Data Scientist Associate (DP-100)
awards.summary: Awarded the Microsoft DP-100 certification for demonstrating proficiency in running machine learning workloads on Azure.

awards.title: Github Actions Certification
awards.summary: Awarded the Github Actions certification for demonstrating proficiency in authoring workflows using GitHub Actions.
